nodes.text: Cularin SpaceNav was a company that operated in the Cularin system during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.
Cularin SpaceNav maintained and analyzed live data about safe shipping routes through the Cularin comet cloud. Most of the data was supplied by the Comet Broom Service and was used by shipping.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar had an inaccuracy placed in some of the data supplied to Cularin SpaceNav by Comet Broom. The freighter Fricasseed Nerf was supplied with the faulty navigational data by SpaceNav and as a result, collided with a comet fragment.

A short time afterward, the heroes of Cularin prevented a comet from crashing into the planet Almas. A conference was held in the Forard Civic Center to discuss the incident and a delegation from Cularin SpaceNav attended the meeting.
